name: Wordpress Multi-Page Post
short_description: Advanced Content Pagination (ACP) WordPress plugin creates ''rich'' pagination buttons for post/page content. This plugin is useful if you have long posts and want to split those in multiple pages, and have pagination buttons with next page title, description and thumbnail, in other words this is an ideal solution for WordPress posts with multiple pages. As you may know WordPress has already a built-in content pagination solution, which can be turned one by using <!-nextpage-> short-code. This short-code creates simple numerated pagination buttons like these: [1] [2] [3] [>] etc… However the ACP plugin allows you to customize those buttons. You’ll be able insert Title, Description and Thumbnail in pagination buttons. You can choose one of these five pagination button layouts
